name: Growing Violets (Demo)
description:
Live through your first year of university with your new roommates! Balance your time, save up money for rent, and maybe find love along the way in this life simulator. 

Growing Violets was made for the 2020 Yuri game jam which had the theme 'queer woman's experience'.  This is the demo of the game, the full release will be out soon!
